system.description:
Your studies have unlocked further capabilities for your bonded artifact. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain a +1 bonus to your choice of your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score, to a maximum value of 20.
  • Half your artificer levels count as wielder levels for the purpose of determining your access to artifact whispers.
  • Half your wielder levels count as artificer levels for the purpose of determining your infusion limit.
  • You may apply a second infusion to your bonded artifact. It observes the same rules as described in Artifact Whisperer, but if both infusions require attunement, it counts against your attunement limit as if it were a single item.
